documents.text: I swear thia cymbalta is causing me to have horrible nightmares!
Azithromycin caused nervousness
You know starting with geodon, the meds messed up my attitude. How odd. It's not just about spirituality. I became a bit mean. That got
@USERNAME enbrel is a miracle but it made my eyes worse :( so couldn't have it anymore :(
Effexor side effects; headaches, no appetite.
@USERNAME Right, some SSRIs are used for cataplexy, as is Effexor. Can be tricky to wean off without rebound.  #nchat
@USERNAME So true Ricky! I went into anaphylactic shock & almost died from taking Cipro! Dangerous drug - be careful!! Take care.
@USERNAME what problems did you have with humira, if you don't mind me asking. I tried infliximab it destroyed my liver.
Saying goodbye to smoking involves more than physical recovery from nicotine addiction #WorldNoTobaccoDay (1)
@USERNAME i never had bleeding or vomiting just alot alot of fatigue and face was pale and lost tons of weight.. #crohns #humira
@USERNAME at the end of most working days! I still have to nap loads just to get through a week. Some days better than others #enbrel
The day after my humira jab and as ever i'm mega tired. May have to go back to bed.
Coming off Cymbalta cold turkey.. day 4... I think I have vertigo! This is awful.
FOUND THEM. Starting back up on Effexor. Vomits shall ensue!
@USERNAME @USERNAME  I was only on 200 mg and was recently switched to 150 mg due to weight. It's still working with enbrel, though.
@USERNAME I had been blaming my dizziness upon standing to my menopause but now on HRT & no more flashes so looked at cymbalta side effs
Lisinopril caused violent nausea
Effexor side effects; headaches, no appetite.
Fuck some lamictal...almost died. #fuck
@USERNAME I don't know that one, but metho made me sick  everyday I took it. I had to stop. Enbrel has worked wonders for me .. so far
RT @USERNAME: Restless Leg Syndrome is bad tonight.  Damn you fluoxetine.
god there is nothing worse than nicotine withdrawal
The day after my humira jab and as ever i'm mega tired. May have to go back to bed.
@USERNAME I don't know that one, but metho made me sick  everyday I took it. I had to stop. Enbrel has worked wonders for me .. so far
@USERNAME fluoxetine and quet combo zombified me...ah, the meds merrygoround #bipolar
@USERNAME @USERNAME all the things I have just make me sleepy as hell: Cymbalta, Klonopin, Ambien. wait what if I take em all togethhssaagg
Lamictal dosage increases kind of wreck my head for a day or two. But they also make me super productive as long as I can do things slowly.
Coming off Cymbalta cold turkey.. day 4... I think I have vertigo! This is awful.
@USERNAME @USERNAME  I was only on 200 mg and was recently switched to 150 mg due to weight. It's still working with enbrel, though.
Day 6 cold turkey from Effexor. I believe this pic adequately represents my descent into madness. Or whatever. http://t.co/Vz0oFABIA0
Cymbalta, my mood has worsened
@USERNAME You can say that again!  I trusted my doc and ended up crippled thanks to just 12 Cipro pills.  Going on 4 years now.
Levothyroxine caused nervousness

@USERNAME at the end of most working days! I still have to nap loads just to get through a week. Some days better than others #enbrel

down to just one tiny dose of effexor each night now. Today wasnt too bad in terms of anxiety & depression, but irritability? WOOSH!! way up
FOUND THEM. Starting back up on Effexor. Vomits shall ensue!
The day after my humira jab and as ever i'm mega tired. May have to go back to bed.
@USERNAME @USERNAME @USERNAME psssh didn't Levaquin make u hallucinate? Girl u best stay Away from shrooms lol
Lamotrigine causing steven johnson syndrome
#effexor #withdrawl is a monster that i have taken by the horns and am wrestling to the ground...this time i am winning! 7thdayfree

FROM JESSICA
I have recently changed anti-depressants from cymbalta to zoloft...does anyone else get daily migraines from taking zoloft?
@USERNAME i never had bleeding or vomiting just alot alot of fatigue and face was pale and lost tons of weight.. #crohns #humira
@USERNAME @USERNAME I don't know what that has to do w/ me. Avelox has hurt my connective tissue,lungs and thyroid. I guess I should feel lucky
You know starting with geodon, the meds messed up my attitude. How odd. It's not just about spirituality. I became a bit mean. That got
god there is nothing worse than nicotine withdrawal
@USERNAME So true Ricky! I went into anaphylactic shock & almost died from taking Cipro! Dangerous drug - be careful!! Take care.
The day after my humira jab and as ever i'm mega tired. May have to go back to bed.
@USERNAME I had been blaming my dizziness upon standing to my menopause but now on HRT & no more flashes so looked at cymbalta side effs
@USERNAME @USERNAME all the things I have just make me sleepy as hell: Cymbalta, Klonopin, Ambien. wait what if I take em all togethhssaagg

Day 4: The initial lamotrigine lethargy kicked in the day before exams. I tell myself that possible failure is better than possible death.
Effexor side effects; headaches, no appetite.

Cymbalta, my mood has worsened
Day 6 cold turkey from Effexor. I believe this pic adequately represents my descent into madness. Or whatever. http://t.co/Vz0oFABIA0
Crying randomly at nothing and everything. Sigh. Thank you #effexor #withdrawls Can you just exit my system already.
A big ol' fuck you to my doctor for not telling me a side effect of metoprolol was depression. Just wait until I see you Friday -.-
down to just one tiny dose of effexor each night now. Today wasnt too bad in terms of anxiety & depression, but irritability? WOOSH!! way up

I am never taking baclofen and norflex the same day again. First I felt super drowsy but now I feel extremely high and it's freaking me out.
